name: Pepega Aim
description:
Hello everyone.

I made this game from twitch emotes and memes in one day.

HOW TO PLAY

Collect the Pepega and avoid the pepelaugh.

Have fun and let us see your highest  score.

My Twitter: https://twitter.com/OkbaAmrate
My upcoming steam game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1721680/Pre_Dusk/
